metadata.Title: CVE-2012-6084 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - high.
metadata.Description:
modules/m_capab.c in (1) ircd-ratbox before 3.0.8 and (2) Charybdis before 3.4.2 does not properly support capability negotiation during server handshakes, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and daemon crash) via a malformed request.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-6084` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

charybdis - 3.4.2-3
No subscription required

notes.Note: seth-arnold> charybdis patch should work on ratbox

criterions.comment: charybdis package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.2-3').
